stories.text:
My 2017 MBP is slowly dying

I like the dark colour of the new MacBook Air, but as a software dev, I prefer the specs of the MacBook Pro 14

Since the MacBook Pro 14 was released more than half a year ago, I’m now bit uncertain whether I should get it anyways or wait a little longer?

What's your thoughts?
stories.title: Ask HN: Which MacBook to Buy Now?

stories.text:
It is a while that I am using grammarly free edition and I can see that its suggestions are most often useful. 
I was thinking about getting the professional license but before it I decided to get some insight into how rest of the community is approaching having better grammar in their text/messages/emails/etc.
stories.title: Ask HN: Are you using Grammarly or similar services for higher emails quality?

stories.text: This add-in allows drill-down of aggregate formulas countif(s), sumif(s) and sumproduct. And also one can navigate formulas with ease and can detect errors without much effort.
